jsonSchema.title: We’d Love Your Feedback!
jsonSchema.description: Tell us how we did so we can keep improving.

elements.name: satisfaction
elements.title: How satisfied are you with your recent experience?

elements.name: highlight
elements.title: What did you enjoy the most?

elements.name: contactPermission
elements.title: Would you like us to follow up on your feedback?

elements.name: thankYouMessage
elements.html: Thank you for your time! Your feedback helps us improve.

jsonData.highlight: The support team resolved my issue in under 10 minutes. The agent was knowledgeable, friendly, and didn't put me on hold once. Genuinely impressed.

jsonData.feedback: The delivery was 4 days late with no proactive communication. I had to contact support twice just to get a status update. Disappointing for a first-time order.

jsonData.highlight: Checkout process was smooth and the product arrived well-packaged. Would have given 5 stars but the shipping took longer than estimated.

jsonData.feedback: Wrong item sent. Return process is confusing and requires printing a label I don't have access to. Still waiting for resolution after a week.

jsonData.highlight: Everything was exactly as described. Fast shipping, great quality, and the unboxing experience was a nice touch. Will definitely order again.
